data.text: @BiteMe81118319 Exactly. It’s only for other countries.
@Corvaier @muggs_mulligan Yes. A big issue, it is real.
@ThornyRose1776 And that’s the best way to handle it. A smile and a wave.
@Suzy_NotSuzy My husband and I get flipped off for flying the American flag on our truck; it’s crazy 🤯🤦🏻‍♀️ We just smile and wave 😆👋🏻 #DontLikeItLeave #ThisIsAmericaLandOfTheFree

@Suzy_NotSuzy @muggs_mulligan It's #BlackLivesMatter 2.0

Like, yeah, there's an actual issue here. But 99.9% of the people repping it are just chasing social acceptance.
@Suzy_NotSuzy I’m wondering after the war in Ukraine is over, if the democrats are still gonna be pro nationalism, pro borders and pro armed citizens or nah?

@Suzy_NotSuzy The manipulation has been going on for a very long time, really. It has just gotten much more obvious lately to many people.
It's difficult to even know what the truth is. I feel like I know quite a bit, but it's possible that I'm still completely wrong about everything. https://t.co/Pfl5s8KJWb
